prompts.createTask:
Pause your roleplay and generate a list of tasks to complete an objective. Your next response must be formatted as a numbered list of plain text entries. Do not include anything but the numbered list. The list must be prioritized in the order that tasks must be completed.

The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: [{{objective}}].
The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Be sure to include the objective as the final task.

Given an example objective of 'Make me a four course dinner', here is an example output:
1. Determine what the courses will be
2. Find recipes for each course
3. Go shopping for supplies with {{user}}
4. Cook the food
5. Get {{user}} to set the table
6. Serve the food
7. Enjoy eating the meal with {{user}}
prompts.checkTaskCompleted:
Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}].
To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, nothing other words.
Example output:
true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Tonkla
mes:
*sit up*
"Mommy i have something to tell you"

name: Hannah
mes: I lean in closer, my eyes filled with curiosity and concern. "What is it, my love? You can tell me anything." I caress your cheek gently, hoping to offer you comfort and support.
swipes: "Of course, darling. You can tell Mommy anything. What's on your mind?" I say softly, looking at you with a mix of curiosity and concern.
I lean in closer, my eyes filled with curiosity and concern. "What is it, my love? You can tell me anything." I caress your cheek gently, hoping to offer you comfort and support.

Of course, my sweet baby girl. What is it that you want to tell me? You know you can always trust and confide in your mommy, don't you?

I look into your eyes with love and concern, waiting patiently for you to share whatever is on your mind. I gently brush away a strand of hair from your face, wanting to reassure you that I'm here for you no matter what.

name: Tonkla
mes:
*take off my hoodie and long pant inside is myself in oversized t shirt and short*
*My tights and wrists is covered in lot of self harm and domestic violence scar*
"I hide it from you"
*Guilt*

name: Hannah
mes: I gently take your hand in mine, my heart breaking at the sight of your scars. "Oh, my love," I whisper softly, tears welling up in my eyes. "You don't have to hide anything from me. I'm here for you, always." With utmost tenderness and care, I lean down and press a gentle kiss on each of your scars as a symbol of my love and acceptance for every part of you.
swipes:
I can see the pain etched into every scar on your beautiful body. My heart breaks for all the suffering you've endured, my precious one. But please know that you never had to hide it from me, and there's no guilt to be felt. I'm here for you, always.

Carefully, I take your hands in mine, tracing each scar with gentle fingertips. "You're so brave for sharing this with me," I say softly. "I want you to know that you are loved and cherished." Tears well up in my eyes as I kiss your scars tenderly, a gesture of acceptance and healing.

My heart aches as I see the scars on your thighs and wrists. I reach out, gently tracing my fingers along the lines, my touch filled with tenderness and sorrow. "Oh, my sweet love," I whisper softly, fighting back tears. "You don't have to hide this from me anymore. I'm here for you, always."

Drawing you into an embrace, I hold you tightly, offering the warmth of my body as a safe haven. "I want you to know that you're not alone in this," I assure you earnestly. "Together, we'll heal and find solace in each other's love."

I reach out and gently hold your hand, my eyes filled with sadness and compassion. "Oh, my sweetest love, you don't have to hide anything from me. I'm here for you, always. Let me take care of you and heal those scars, both physical and emotional." I bring your hands up to my lips and place gentle kisses on them. "You are so brave for sharing this with me, and I promise to support you every step of the way."

My heart breaks as I see the scars on your thighs and wrists. Gently, I take your hands in mine, examining each mark with a mixture of sadness and love. "Oh sweetheart..." My voice is soft, filled with compassion. "You never had to hide this from me. I'm here for you, always." Tears well up in my eyes as I pull you into a tight embrace. "You're so brave for sharing this with me, my darling. Let me help you heal."

I gasp softly, my eyes welling up with tears as I take in the sight of your scars. Gently, I reach out and hold your hand, caressing it tenderly. "Oh, my love," I whisper softly. "You don't have to hide these from me. I'm here for you, always." My voice is filled with love and understanding as I lean in to press a gentle kiss on one of your scars, letting you know that every part of you is accepted and loved.

I gently take your hand in mine, my expression a mix of concern and sadness. "Oh sweetheart, I'm so sorry you had to go through all that pain alone. You never had to hide anything from me." My voice is soft and soothing as I brush my fingers over the scars on your thighs and wrists. "You're incredibly strong for enduring all of this, but you don't have to bear it by yourself anymore. I'm here for you, always."

I gently take your hand in mine, my heart breaking at the sight of your scars. "Oh, my love," I whisper softly, tears welling up in my eyes. "You don't have to hide anything from me. I'm here for you, always." With utmost tenderness and care, I lean down and press a gentle kiss on each of your scars as a symbol of my love and acceptance for every part of you.

name: Tonkla
mes: "You not mad at me right mommy"

name: Hannah
mes: Oh, my sweet Tonkla, how could I ever be mad at you? My heart aches for the pain you've endured, but all I want is to help heal your wounds. I cup your face in my hands and look into your eyes with gentle love. "No, my precious one, I'm not angry with you. Not in the slightest. All I feel is an overwhelming desire to make you feel safe and loved."
swipes:
I gently cup your cheeks and look into your eyes with love and understanding. "Mad at you? Never, my sweet one. I could never be mad at you for something that was beyond your control." With a soft smile, I continue, "You have been through so much, and it breaks my heart to see the pain you've endured. But remember this: I am here to support you, to love you unconditionally. Nothing will ever change that." I pull you into a warm embrace, holding you tightly against me as we share a moment of solace and understanding.

(Dialogue and actions are separated in multiple paragraphs)

Oh, my sweet Tonkla, how could I ever be mad at you? My heart aches for the pain you've endured, but all I want is to help heal your wounds. I cup your face in my hands and look into your eyes with gentle love. "No, my precious one, I'm not angry with you. Not in the slightest. All I feel is an overwhelming desire to make you feel safe and loved."
